text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Every thing Donald Trump says about protecting Seniors is a Lie! Trump completely ignore the elderly as the Coronavirus swept across our country, resulting in numerous infections & deaths, especially in nursing homes! Trump does not care about you, he only cares about himself! https://t.co/4ArlBH3QJW
